questions.question: What is the dominant color scheme of the phone case's design, based purely on visual observation?

What is the overall shape of the depicted product, considering only visual information?
Judging from the image alone, what color are the stripes that contrast with the lighter background?
Disregarding any text, what is the visual texture implied by the phone case's surface?
Based solely on visual inspection, what is the apparent finish of the phone case's surface?
From the image alone, can you identify any visible logos or brand markings on the case?
If you were to describe the visual style of the stripes, what would be the most apt single word?
Based purely on visual analysis, what is the orientation of the chevron pattern on the case?
Excluding metadata, what is the visual thickness of the phone case, relative to the phone itself?

What is the implied design style by the use of the graphic pattern on the item?
